result.title: How to sync an app with online database?
result.content:
Hi.

Consider a messenger app like Yahoo Messenger or Viber or Telegram App. How do they sync and figure out that there is a new message instantly? I mean there is a short period from the time that first person sends the message and the time that second one got it. (Let me cross Viber from the list :D )

One way is to refresh and read the online database every one second for example. But that's too slow and also your server is working all the time and there is something in order of million querys running every second (Depends on number of users).

I wanted to know that is there any better way to do this? Something like sending a pocket to device from server when there is a new message...
